thread.section_title: Apricot Power Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Apricot Power | apricotpower.com | 2 of 43
thread.title: Katharine

author: Katharine
title: Katharine
text: The transaction went very well. My husband had skin cancer on his leg above the knee which we successfully removed with black salve. Now he is taking the apricot seeds to try to prevent any reoccurrences. In less than a week, he is reporting higher energy levels and feels it is attributed to the seeds. The bitterness doesn't bother him, and he likes them. Thank you for providing this service.
